meanings.definition: To give out or deliver something to a number of recipients.
meanings.sent1: The teacher distributes candies to all the students.
meanings.sent2: The postman distributes letters to different houses.
meanings.sent3: The clown distributes smiles to everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The sun distributes warmth to the entire planet.
meanings.sent5: The kind farmer distributes fresh vegetables to the community.

meanings.definition: To divide or spread something out in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The baker distributes chocolate chips evenly in the cookie dough.
meanings.sent2: The farmer distributes seeds across the field for planting.
meanings.sent3: The artist distributes colors in a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent4: The wind distributes leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The chef distributes spices carefully in the dish.
